page.title: 08NAIRN:NAIRN ACADEMY
page.content: The school{building}was designed to be as flexible as possible,and the layout ,though unconventional,is very practical.The building is mainly single storey,and as well as normal classrooms,has several{open-plan areas.The shape of the rooms is hexagonal.The school also has a gym,a games hall,1 squash and 2 tennis courts.In the school are 60 teachers and 18 other staff.These 78 staff serve 793 pupils,spread among 6 years and 29 classes.Apart from normal subjects offered are secretarial studies,accounting and typing.The school also has an excellent canteen,with 8 staff.In a survey,the meals proved very popular.The average meal is about 65p,and the average menu has a traditional dish,a variety of 'junk food',hot dogs,chips etc,and several sweets.Drinks are on sale too.
